author: geoff
msg: revision 330346 broke all.t handling, mostly due to a misunderstanding
of which $_ was being checked where.  so
o partially revert the prior change, using $_ where required in grep()
o add all.t tests so nobody breaks it again
note that there are two all.t files being added, since a prior all.t
iteration corrected the situation where only one all.t test was
allowed to be processed per test run

author: jvanzyl
msg: o clean up the dependencies in the POM, i really only need to depend on the
core and everything else will come in transitively
o rolling things back to use the 2.0 release maven artifacts, i can
subsequently, deploy 2.0.1-SNAPSHOTs and when 2.0.1 is released I will
release 2.0.1 of the embedder. I think the releases of the embedder must
follow closely on the heels of Maven itself.
